Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were used to assess a-synuclein filament assembly.

Readout description.Result Description: The E46K mutation resulted in a significantly increased ability of a-synuclein to bind to negatively charged liposomes compared to the wild-type protein.

Biological replicates.Description: No biological replicates were performed in this study.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates were performed in this study.

Basic positive control.Description: No positive control was included in this study.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was included in this study.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No specific threshold was mentioned in the literature.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No specific threshold was mentioned in the literature.
